verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh these הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-pa-Tim, Now these [are] the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תָּשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> ta-Sim which thou shalt set לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. before

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki If תִקְנֶה֙ <S%H7069><s%> tik-Neh If thou buy עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved servant עִבְרִ֔י <S%H5680><s%> 'iv-Ri, an Hebrew שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years יַעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> ya-'a-Vod; he shall serve וּבַ֨שְּׁבִעִ֔ת <S%H7637><s%> u-Vash-she-vi-'It, and in the seventh יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze he shall go out לַֽחָפְשִׁ֖י <S%H2670><s%> la-cha-fe-Shi free חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam. for nothing

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If בְּגַפּ֥וֹ <S%H1610><s%> be-gap-Po by himself יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo If he came in בְּגַפּ֣וֹ <S%H1610><s%> be-gap-Po by himself יֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze; he shall go out אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if בַּ֤עַל <S%H1167><s%> Ba-'al is the husband אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah then his wife ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וְיָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'Ah shall go out אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To his wife עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav If his master יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> yit-ten- have given ל֣וֹ lo אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, him a wife וְיָלְדָה־ <S%H3205><s%> ve-Yal-dah- and she have born ל֥וֹ lo בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim him sons א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> va-Not; or daughters הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah the wife וִילָדֶ֗יהָ <S%H3206><s%> vi-la-Dei-ha, and her children תִּהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh shall belong לַֽאדֹנֶ֔יהָ <S%H113><s%> la-do-Nei-ha, shall be her master's וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and he יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze and he shall go out בְגַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1610><s%> ve-gap-Po. by himself

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if אָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mor shall plainly יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar say הָעֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> ha-'E-ved, And if the servant אָהַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav-ti I love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, my master אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti my wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֑י <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nai; and my children לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> 'e-Tze I will not go out חָפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H2670><s%> cha-fe-Shi. free

וְהִגִּישׁ֤וֹ <S%H5066><s%> ve-hig-gi-Sho shall bring אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav Then his master אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, him unto the judges וְהִגִּישׁוֹ֙ <S%H5066><s%> ve-hig-gi-Sho he shall also bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַדֶּ֔לֶת <S%H1817><s%> had-De-let, him to the door א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמְּזוּזָ֑ה <S%H4201><s%> ham-me-zu-Zah; or unto the door post וְרָצַ֨ע <S%H7527><s%> ve-ra-Tza' shall bore אֲדֹנָ֤יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav and his master אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָזְנוֹ֙ <S%H241><s%> a-ze-No his ear בַּמַּרְצֵ֔עַ <S%H4836><s%> bam-mar-Tze-a', through with an aul וַעֲבָד֖וֹ <S%H5647><s%> va-'a-va-Do and he shall serve לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. him for ever ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יִמְכֹּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> yim-Kor sell אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And if a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> bit-To his daughter לְאָמָ֑ה <S%H519><s%> le-'a-Mah; to be a maidservant לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo is not תֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze she shall not go out כְּצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> ke-Tzet do הָעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> ha-'a-va-Dim. as the menservants

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If רָעָ֞ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah is displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֧י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei the eyes אֲדֹנֶ֛יהָ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-ha not her master אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who; לֹא lo כלֹ֥ו <S%H3808><s%> Lo not קיְעָדָ֖הּ <S%H3259><s%> ye-'a-Dah who hath betrothed וְהֶפְדָּ֑הּ <S%H6299><s%> ve-hef-Dah; her to himself then shall he let her be redeemed לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am nation נָכְרִ֛י <S%H5237><s%> na-che-Ri her unto a strange לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> yim-Shol he shall have no power לְמָכְרָ֖הּ <S%H4376><s%> le-ma-che-Rah to sell בְּבִגְדוֹ־ <S%H898><s%> be-vig-dov- seeing he hath dealt deceitfully בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If לִבְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> liv-No her unto his son יִֽיעָדֶ֑נָּה <S%H3259><s%> yi-'a-Den-nah; And if he have betrothed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> ke-mish-Pat with her after the manner הַבָּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> hab-ba-Not of daughters יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-seh- he shall deal לָּֽהּ׃ Lah.

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If אַחֶ֖רֶת <S%H312><s%> 'a-Che-ret him another יִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> yik-kach- If he take ל֑וֹ lo; שְׁאֵרָ֛הּ <S%H7607><s%> she-'e-Rah [wife] her food כְּסוּתָ֥הּ <S%H3682><s%> ke-su-Tah her raiment וְעֹנָתָ֖הּ <S%H5772><s%> ve-'o-na-Tah and her duty of marriage לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo may not יִגְרָֽע׃ <S%H1639><s%> yig-Ra'. shall he not diminish

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If שְׁלָ֨שׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> she-Lash- not these three אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh, these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo he will not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh And if he do לָ֑הּ Lah; וְיָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'Ah unto her then shall she go out חִנָּ֖ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam free אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein without כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. without money ס sa-Mek

מַכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh He that smiteth אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man וָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met so that he die מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. put to death

וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not צָדָ֔ה <S%H6658><s%> tza-Dah, And if a man lie not in wait וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ve-ha-'E-lo-Him but God אִנָּ֣ה <S%H579><s%> 'in-Nah deliver לְיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> le-ya-Do; [him] into his hand וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti then I will appoint לְךָ֙ le-Cha מָק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom, thee a place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which יָנ֖וּס <S%H5127><s%> ya-Nus whither he shall flee שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. in it ס sa-Mek

וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יָזִ֥ד <S%H2102><s%> ya-Zid come presumptuously אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish But if a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- toward רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu upon his neighbour לְהָרְג֣וֹ <S%H2026><s%> le-ha-re-Go to slay בְעָרְמָ֑ה <S%H6195><s%> ve-'a-re-Mah; him with guile מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im him from מִזְבְּחִ֔י <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chi, him from mine altar תִּקָּחֶ֖נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-ka-Chen-nu thou shalt take לָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut. that he may die ס sa-Mek

וּמַכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> u-mak-Keh And he that smiteth אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo or his mother מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. put to death

וְגֹנֵ֨ב <S%H1589><s%> ve-go-Nev And he that stealeth אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man וּמְכָר֛וֹ <S%H4376><s%> u-me-cha-Ro and selleth וְנִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> ve-nim-Tza him or if he be found בְיָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Do in his hand מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

וּמְקַלֵּ֥ל <S%H7043><s%> u-me-kal-Lel And he that curseth אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo or his mother מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. be put to death ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יְרִיבֻ֣ן <S%H7378><s%> ye-ri-Vun strive אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim, together and one וְהִכָּה־ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-kah- smite אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish and one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, another בְּאֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> be-'E-ven with a stone א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בְאֶגְרֹ֑ף <S%H106><s%> ve-'eg-Rof; with [his] fist וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo does not יָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut and he die וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-Fal not but keepeth לְמִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H4904><s%> le-mish-Kav. [his] bed

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if יָק֞וּם <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum If he rise again וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ve-hit-hal-Lech and walk בַּח֛וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ba-Chutz abroad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִשְׁעַנְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4938><s%> mish-'an-To upon his staff וְנִקָּ֣ה <S%H5352><s%> ve-nik-Kah [him] be quit הַמַּכֶּ֑ה <S%H5221><s%> ham-mak-Keh; then shall he that smote רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but שִׁבְתּ֛וֹ <S%H7674><s%> shiv-To [for] the loss of his time יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten only he shall pay וְרַפֹּ֥א <S%H7495><s%> ve-rap-Po and shall cause [him] to be thoroughly יְרַפֵּֽא׃ <S%H7495><s%> ye-rap-Pe. healed ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יַכֶּה֩ <S%H5221><s%> yak-Keh smite אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And if a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַבְדּ֜וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do his servant א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲמָתוֹ֙ <S%H519><s%> a-ma-To or his maid בַּשֵּׁ֔בֶט <S%H7626><s%> bash-She-vet, with a rod וּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> u-Met and he die תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; under his hand נָקֹ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> na-Kom he shall be surely יִנָּקֵֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> yin-na-Kem. punished

אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Notwithstanding אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom a day א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or יוֹמַ֖יִם <S%H3117><s%> yo-Ma-yim A day יַעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod; if he continue לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יֻקַּ֔ם <S%H5358><s%> yuk-Kam, he shall not be punished כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כַסְפּ֖וֹ <S%H3701><s%> chas-Po for he [is] his money הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יִנָּצ֣וּ <S%H5327><s%> yin-na-Tzu strive אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim, If men וְנָ֨גְפ֜וּ <S%H5062><s%> ve-Na-ge-Fu and hurt אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a woman הָרָה֙ <S%H2030><s%> ha-Rah with child וְיָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'U depart יְלָדֶ֔יהָ <S%H3206><s%> ye-la-Dei-ha, so that her fruit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo is no יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become אָס֑וֹן <S%H611><s%> a-Son; [from her] and yet no mischief follow עָנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H6064><s%> a-Noosh he shall be surely יֵעָנֵ֗שׁ <S%H6064><s%> ye-'a-Nesh, punished כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יָשִׁ֤ית <S%H7896><s%> ya-Shit will lay עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> Ba-'al husband הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, according as the woman's וְנָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan upon him and he shall pay בִּפְלִלִֽים׃ <S%H6414><s%> bif-li-Lim. as the judges

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if אָס֖וֹן <S%H611><s%> a-Son And if [any] mischief follow יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh; become וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah then thou shalt give נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh life תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh. for life
